Hey tpb_4_ever, I'm having a problem. I downloaded the torrent, and I dragged the 2 folders into my railworks folder, overrighted what was asked, and i went in game, If I try to do a mission with sherman hill, as soon as it starts loading, it crash's and gives me "Something bad has happened, Would you like to save a dump file?"

Please help! Thank you!

hello Josh,

You will need a cracked railworks copy in order to make sure the non legit addons work. Head over to our forums in case you need further help :)
Link is in description
Hello, I would like to know if you can record RWP addons into a legal version TS 2013? thanks

few problems. none of the diesels have any lights except for step lights, throttle and reverser do not notch, and none of the keyboard controls work.

it is still fun nonetheless so thank you.
norg,somewhere you have a bad file. I had same prob till I went to Superbay and d/l those files and overwrote. No good as gold.
